items.name: Bog-oak pipe
items.description: A hard, black pipe carved from wood dredged out of a peat bog. The sombre faces of ancient bog-denizens can be spied drifting in the smoke. Said to be the favoured pipe of wizards of all kinds.

items.name: Cherry-wood pipe
items.description: A fine pipe of carved cherry, producing a smooth, aromatic smoke.

items.name: Clay pipe
items.description: A common pipe of fired clay, often inscribed with motifs, symbols, or script.

items.name: Gourd pipe (mossling style)
items.description: A curiously shaped, colourful gourd with a curved stem and a plump bowl. Favoured by mosslings, who craft gourd pipes in their hidden communities.

_metadata.extraction_note: Review and correct this data before importing
